title: Niger: Boko Haram terrorists flee back to Nigeria after hitting Niger military base in Diffa
text:
By Wars in the World (Reporter)
Total:
Niger: Boko Haram terrorists flee back to Nigeria after hitting Niger military base in Diffa
Sunday, January 21, 2018 16:49
% of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.
Gunmen suspected to be members of the dreaded islamic sect, Boko Haram, have attacked Nigerien Military base in Toumour village, Southeastern part of Diffa Province, military sources in Niger have revealed.
Ahmed Salkida, a Nigerian Journalist with access to information on the terrorists group twitted on Thursday.
